title: *GABRIEL KREUTHER
seo_description: A newcomer to the fine dining scene, this namesake restaurant is already on its way to becoming a classic New York table. A stark but comforting space is home to nightly tasting menus, while the bar serves crowd favorites a-la-carte.
contents:
Classic tarte flambée (smoked bacon, onion, crème fraîche, fromage blanc)
41 W 42nd St
walk: 18 minutes

A newcomer to the fine dining scene, this namesake restaurant is already on its way to becoming a classic New York table. A stark but comforting space is home to nightly tasting menus, while the bar serves crowd favorites a-la-carte.
